activate.SetAsPrimary: Beha {{1}} joalo ka likhetho tsa ka {{2}}
activate.ChoosePassPhrase:
Khetha poleloana ea pase eo u kenang ho eona.
Polelo e bonolo e nang le mantsoe a seng makae ao u tla a hopola habonolo.
activate.ChoosePassPhraseSeeSuggestions: Khetha mantsoe a nepahetseng ho sireletsa ak'haonte ea hau. Sheba litlhahiso bakeng sa maikutlo a mang.
activate.IfYouFeel: Haeba u ikutloa hore ho na le phoso, u ka khona

authorize.TermsLabel:
Ke balile ebile kea lumela
ho ea {{link}}
authorize.mustAgree: Pele u tlameha ho lumellana le lipehelo.

notifications.title: Tumello
notifications.prompt: Na u batla ho lumella litemoso? U tla fumana lintlha tse mabapi le lintho tseo u li tsotellang.
notifications.WelcomePleaseVerifyEmail: Rea u amohela! Ka kopo, netefatsa aterese ea hau ea lengolo-tsoibila.
notifications.WelcomeVerifyEmail: Rea u amohela! Netefatsa aterese ea hau ea lengolo-tsoibila.
notifications.ForgetPass: Lumela, na u lebetse poleloana ea hau ea lekunutu?
notifications.PassphraseSaved: Polelo ea pase ea hau e bolokiloe.
notifications.CompletedActivation: O qetile ho kenya tshebetsong mosebedisi.
notifications.CompletedActivationLogIn: O qetile ho kenya tshebetsong mosebedisi. Leka ho kena hona joale.

login.title: Rea u amohela
login.directionsNoRegister: Kena haeba u na le ak'haonte.
login.passphrase: Kenya poleloana ea hau ea pasa:
login.resendConfirm: A na u batla ho romela molaetsa ho tsosolosa poleloana ea hau ea lekunutu?
login.resendSuccess: Sheba hore na ho na le molaetsa oa ho seta phasewete ea hau bocha
login.noPassphrase: Pele o ka kena, o tlameha ho seta poleloana ea pase ka ho tobetsa sehokelo se molaetseng oa hau oa ts'ebetso.
login.notVerified: U tlameha ho iphumanela molaetsa oa ho kenya tshebetsong hore o kgone ho kena.
login.emailExists: Na u kile ua leka ho ingolisa ka lengolo-tsoibila lee? Haeba ho joalo, hlahloba inbox ea hau ho kenya akhaonto ea hau. Tobetsa ho romela molaetsa hape
login.mobileExists: A na u kile oa leka ho ingolisa ka nomoro ee ea mohala pele? Haeba ho joalo, hlahloba SMS ea hau ho bula akhaonto ea hau. Tobetsa ho romela molaetsa hape
login.newUser: kapa theha ak'haonte e ncha ka tlase

placeholders.identifier: # ea hau ea mohala kapa lengolo-tsoibila
placeholders.email: kenya aterese ea hau ea lengolo-tsoibila

login.facebookNoEmail: Ak'haonte ea hau ea facebook ha e na aterese ea lengolo-tsoibila e netefalitsoeng. Feela kena ka tsela ea tlhaho.
login.picTooltip: U ka fetola setšoantšo sena hamorao

alert.title: E lebisa ho Wallet
alert.content: Hang ha u koala puisano ena, u tla isoa sepacheng sa hau. Kamora ho kena, khutlela leqepheng lena.

placeholders.identifier: kenya nomoro ea hau ea mohala kapa lengolo-tsoibila
placeholders.mobile: kenya nomoro ea hau ea mohala
placeholders.email: kenya aterese ea hau ea lengolo-tsoibila

prompt.title: {{Platform}} Akhaonto
prompt.noLongerUsing: Ha u sa hokeloa ho {{platform}} joalo ka
